title: Kratos Warrior Watch Face
summary: Bolster your strength with this powerful time piece!
description: Kratos, enforcer of Zeus, is the embodiment of power and strength.  As such, one would be battle ready with a time piece in his name.  Don this watch face on your smart watch to fend off chaos in glorious battle!This watch tells the time with smooth hour and minute hands to the pixel.  Tell the time like you would on a real watch.  The seconds are displayed on the fire ring around the watch face.Choose the color-scheme for the background, fire ring and font from millions of possible color combinations.Select from the Day of the week, the date and the watch battery level to be displayed on the two info panels on the watch face.Once downloaded, this app can be opened from your handheld using Android Wear.  You can download Android Wear from the Play Store.  If it does not appear after a while, you can use Settings > Resync Apps found in Android Wear.  You can also check to see if the watch face has already been installed on your device.Find all available watchfaces at:  http://osthoro.wix.com/osthoro
descriptionHTML:
Kratos, enforcer of Zeus, is the embodiment of power and strength. As such, one would be battle ready with a time piece in his name. Don this watch face on your smart watch to fend off chaos in glorious battle!

This watch tells the time with smooth hour and minute hands to the pixel. Tell the time like you would on a real watch. The seconds are displayed on the fire ring around the watch face.

Choose the color-scheme for the background, fire ring and font from millions of possible color combinations.

Select from the Day of the week, the date and the watch battery level to be displayed on the two info panels on the watch face.

Once downloaded, this app can be opened from your handheld using Android Wear. You can download Android Wear from the Play Store. If it does not appear after a while, you can use Settings > Resync Apps found in Android Wear. You can also check to see if the watch face has already been installed on your device.

Find all available watchfaces at: http://osthoro.wix.com/osthoro
recentChanges: • Main face is now black for an improved appearance with color settings
